topic.title: Installation for HPE Helion Entry-scale Cloud with Ironic Flat Network (BMaaS)

section.p: This page describes the installation step requirements for the HPE Helion Entry-scale Cloud with Ironic Flat Network (BMaaS).

section.title: Configure Your Environment
section.p: This part of the install is going to depend on the specific cloud configuration you are going to use.

ol.li:
Setup your configuration files, as follows:
See the sample sets of configuration files in the ~/helion/examples/ directory. Each set will have an accompanying README.md file that explains the contents of each of the configuration files.
Copy the example configuration files into the required setup directory and edit them to contain the details of your environment: cp -r ~/helion/examples/entry-scale-ironic-flat-network/* ~/helion/my_cloud/definition/

section.title: Ironic configuration
section.p:
Run the ironic-cloud-configure.yml playbook below:
cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts ironic-cloud-configure.yml
